legendaryAndEpicAnimationEnabled.name: Legendary/Epic Animation
legendaryAndEpicAnimationEnabled.description: Whether the standard animation is played for a legendary or epic drop

comboChestEnabled.name: Combo Chest
comboChestEnabled.description: Whether the combo box is displayed

itemFrameEnabled.name: Itemframe
itemFrameEnabled.description: Whether a frame should be displayed for items that have a forged state

hideDefaultComboChest.name: Hide default
hideDefaultComboChest.description: Decide whether the default combo chest (top left) should be rendered by the game.
